name: Escape from Magic Reform School
description:
Jammie the Witch’s misadventures have finally caught up to her. Dangerous gardens, reckless flying, stealing a dragon hatchling, letting dogs bake sweets. (Visit shibeyfacegames.itch.io for more!)

The Council of Witches has had enough. Jammie has been sentenced to 3 hours of magic safety classes at the Yggdrasil Branch of the Reform School for Careless Witches. Will she give in to such a fate? Not likely!!

This stealth/action/platformer has 8 endings to find! Good luck!

Controls:

[Arrow keys] or [AWD] for movement and jump.

[Down key] or [S] for interaction on pots or when the interact symbol appears above your head.

Hold [Mouse Right] or [SHIFT] to sneak instead of walk. Walking will draw attention from nearby guards.

[Mouse Left] to shoot bubbles toward the mouse cursor. Requires MANA to use.

Be sure to read the detailed instructions in game!
